message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $20,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit to meet you halfway. How about $16,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can we meet there?
